notes.content: drizzle-kit pull outputs to ./drizzle/ by default. Schema was copied to src/db/schema.ts for proper organization.
Used local Next.js API route pattern for getProjects() rather than Server Actions, maintaining consistency with existing /api/browse pattern and client-side Zustand store architecture.
Initial drizzle-orm version (0.38.0) had compatibility issues with drizzle-kit (ERR_PACKAGE_PATH_NOT_EXPORTED). Updated to drizzle-orm 0.45.0 and drizzle-kit 0.31.0 which resolved the issue.
